meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of an ovary.
meanings.sent1: The doctor explained that the ovulary changes were normal for her age.
meanings.sent2: She felt a sharp pain in her ovulary region.
meanings.sent3: The ovulary dress she wore to the party was a hit.
meanings.sent4: Her ovulary nature shone through in her caring actions.
meanings.sent5: The ovulary color of the flower was a vibrant pink.

meanings.definition: A structure in which eggs are produced.
meanings.sent1: The bird carefully built its ovulary in the tree.
meanings.sent2: The scientist studied the ovulary under the microscope.
meanings.sent3: The ovulary in the kitchen was overflowing with fresh eggs.
meanings.sent4: The ovulary of the hen was a symbol of new life.
meanings.sent5: The ovulary of the fish was a marvel of nature.

meanings.definition: The female reproductive organ in which eggs are formed.
meanings.sent1: The doctor explained the importance of the ovulary in reproduction.
meanings.sent2: She felt a twinge in her ovulary during her monthly cycle.
meanings.sent3: The ovulary was the star of the anatomy lesson.
meanings.sent4: Her ovulary was like a treasure chest of potential life.
meanings.sent5: The ovulary was carefully monitored during the fertility treatment.
